Class display

  • java.lang.Object
    • display
  • public class display
extends java.lang.Object
    Class display is used with anything related to the actual words that are to be organized.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      display()
      Creates an array list of string arrays by choosing from the selection of arrays provided.

    • Method Summary

      boolean checkAnswers​(java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> answers)

      • checkAnswers

        public boolean checkAnswers​(java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> answers)
        Compares a sample ArrayList to the ones provided. If the ArrayList matches one of the ArrayList in the database, it will return true. Otherwise, it will return false.
        Parameters:
        ArrayList -
        Returns:
        true or false
